name: Brand Audit Agent Full Output Test
description: Tests that the brand audit agent returns 18 sections with unique content, proper formatting, and bibliography.

parts.text: Do a brand audit for Nike.

Nike Brand Audit Report

1. Origin Story
Nike was founded in 1964 as Blue Ribbon Sports by Bill Bowerman and Phil Knight. The company officially became Nike, Inc. in 1971. [1]
Key people: Phil Knight, Bill Bowerman. [1]
Brand values: Innovation, performance, inspiration. [2]
Early innovations: The waffle sole running shoe. [3]
Sources Used: [1] https://about.nike.com, [2] https://www.nike.com, [3] https://www.businessinsider.com

2. Style Mission Vision Major Shifts
Mission: Bring inspiration and innovation to every athlete in the world. [1]
Vision: To remain the most authentic, connected, and distinctive brand. [2]
Brand evolution: From running shoes to a global sports brand. [1]
Themes: “Just Do It,” empowering athletes. [2]
Sources Used: [1] https://about.nike.com, [2] https://www.nike.com

... (sections 3-17 here, each section must have unique content and sources) ...

18. Advertising Spend
Nike’s annual advertising spend is estimated at $3.5 billion, with a heavy focus on digital, social media, and influencer partnerships. [1]
Spend breakdown: Digital $1.8B, TV $900M, Print $300M, OOH $250M, Influencer $250M. [2]
ROI metrics: Consistently above industry benchmark. [3]
Sources Used: [1] https://adage.com, [2] https://www.marketingdive.com, [3] https://www.statista.com

Bibliography:
[1] Nike’s History and Mission. About Nike. 2024. https://about.nike.com
[2] Nike Brand Values. Nike. 2024. https://www.nike.com
[3] Nike’s Waffle Sole History. Business Insider. 2024. https://www.businessinsider.com
[4] Nike Ad Spend. AdAge. 2024. https://adage.com
[5] Nike Marketing Spend Breakdown. Marketing Dive. 2024. https://www.marketingdive.com
[6] Nike ROI Metrics. Statista. 2024. https://www.statista.com
